item.title: Mexico to send Texas water amid treaty, tariff dispute

item.title: Trump exempts computers, phones, other electronics from tariffs
item.description: Computers, smartphones, chips and other devices and components, including many from China, will be exempted from President Trump's reciprocal tariffs.
